Supported Devices and Features

This list is the most current resource for checking which devices and features are and are not supported. If a device is not listed, it is not supported. The Hue+ and KrakenX devices are supported, the Hue 2 or Smart Device is most likely next. If you would like to request a specific device or feature, please submit an issue at NZXTSharp's GitHub page, and tag it with device-request, or feature-request.

The supported features tables use the following schema for column values:
  • NI - Not Implemented
  • WIP - Work In Progress/ In Process of Implementation
  • ITT - Implemented, Still Need to Test
  • TNW - Tested, Not Working
  • TFW - Tested, Fully Working

    • Hue+

    Device Features

    Feature NI WIP ITT TNW TFW
    Unit LED On X
    Unit LED Off X
    Channel On X
    Channel Off X
    Channel Handshakes X
    Subdevices X
    Subdevice LEDs X

    Effects

    Feature NI WIP ITT TNW TFW
    Fixed X
    Fading X
    Spectrum Wave X
    Marquee X
    Covering Marquee X
    Alternating X
    Pulse X
    Breathing X
    Candle Light X
    Wings X

    KrakenX

    Device Features

    Feature NI WIP ITT TNW TFW
    Get Pump Speed X
    Set Pump Speed X
    Channel On X
    Channel Off X
    Get Fan Speed X
    Set Fan Speed X
    Get Liquid Temp X
    Get Firmware Version X

    Effects

    Feature NI WIP ITT TNW TFW

    Fading X
    Spectrum Wave X
    Marquee X
    Covering Marquee X
    Alternating X
    Pulse X
    Breathing X (Partially)
